description:
go/parser: permit [...]T where array types are permitted

More lenient parsing with better error recovery.
It's easier for the type check to pick up the slack.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5ff1a3660917 ***

go/parser: permit [...]T where array types are permitted

More lenient parsing with better error recovery.
It's easier for the type check to pick up the slack.

R=iant

subject: code review 6856108: go/parser: permit [...]T where array types are permitted
